## Structure

### Supply Chain Partner

We included a Supply Chain Partner which reliably provided Relief Supplies. The time to deliver a shipment of supplies was made variable though the Reference Property *SupplierPartnerTravelTimeToWarehouse*. 

The delivery vehicle, *PartnerVehicle*, was set to require a full load prior to departing for the Warehouse.
